DOC.brief_summary: The objective study define repeatability reproducibility quantify flow-mediated dilation ( FMD ) brachial artery ( BA ) use AngioDefender ( AD ) methodology . Repeatability assess repeat AD testing subject 1 hour apart , use AD device operator . Reproducibility assess compare FMD score obtain subject , use different AD device operator .
DOC.brief_title: Vascular Reactivity Assessment AngioDefender Device -- A Precision Study
DOC.criteria: 1 . Men woman , ≥18 year old 2 . Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group/Zubrod score performance status 0 , 1 , 2 , determine within 7 day prior FMD test Study Day 1 ( Visit 1 ) 3 . Written inform consent understood sign ; understand study procedure ability comply length study 1 . Body mass index ( BMI ) > 50 kg/m2 2 . Midupper arm circumference arm select FMD test < 17 cm > 42 cm 3 . Sinus arrhythmia , atrial fibrillation , atrial flutter , multifocal atrial tachycardia , frequent ( > 1 per 10sec strip ) premature atrial ventricular contraction ( isolate , nonisolated , alternate ) , document 12lead ECG rhythm strip time subject screening . 4 . Clinical sign and/or symptom active viral bacterial infection 5 . Resting muscle tremor inability remain still duration test period 6 . Systolic blood pressure ( SBP ) rest > 170 mmHg diastolic blood pressure ( DBP ) rest ≥110 mmHg . 7 . Diabetic subject Type I II 8 . Previous intolerable adverse reaction ( ) vascular test use upper extremity occlusive pneumatic cuff
